message.original: レスタニア中部に広がる大平原 白竜が墜ちた地として神殿が築かれ、人々が集った ことから、全ての民にとって寄り所と言える地域に なった。そのため、比較的魔物の勢力は弱いが オークなど強力な魔物の侵入は脅威となる
message.translation: A large plains located in central Lestania. A temple was built here, for this was the place the White Dragon fell, and so people gathered, and therefore became citizens. Although weak, monsters can be found here.

message.original: ハイデル平原南部に位置する村 ワインなど果実酒造りが盛んだったが、近年は不作 と原因不明の病により活力が落ちつつある この異変には、廃屋化したハイデル教会が何らか の形で関わるのではと噂されている
message.translation: A village located in the southern part of the Hidell plains. Wine and other beverages used to be plentiful, but in recent years, bad crops and blights have been common due to unknown diseases. Due to this, the Hidell church was abandoned. It is rumored to be involved somehow.

message.original: テルの東にあるハイデル教会地下墓地 以前は祈りの場として訪れる者も多かったが 廃屋化して後、扉が開かれたことはない 夜間徘徊する亡者の目撃談もあり、今では誰も 教会に近づかなくなっている
message.translation: Hidell Church's subsurface cemetery east of Tel. Previously, many visited as a place of prayer, however, its doors were never opened again after it was abandoned. Stories say you can see the dead wander at night. Nobody dares go near it.

message.original: <COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL> テルの西に落下したアークの裏側から続く別階層 表側とは異なり、こちらには恐るべき危険性を 秘めた大型の錬魔も確認されたという。後に神殿を 攻める足がかりとして準備されていた可能性がある
message.translation: <COL ffdc78> A door requiring a "Jewelry" key. </COL> Another layer that continues from the back of the ark that fell west of Tel. This passage is far more dangerous than the front. A strange odor is present here as well. It's possible that this location was prepared as a foothold in case of attack.
